chapter.title: Nightly builds
chapter.p: Nightly snapshots of are available at: http://ophelia.cs.put.poznan.pl:2001. Because nightly snapshots are what they are (automatic checkouts from the CVS), there is no warranty this link will be active at all.

chapter.title: Stable (more or less) builds
chapter.p: There are no online stable builds at the moment. We're approaching stable release though, so check out this web site soon! Also, there may be sneak previews in the form of binary releases.
